text: Ólöf Nordal (3 December 1966 - 8 February 2017) was an Icelandic politician. She was a member of the Independence Party. She served as the Minister of the Interior from 4 December 2014 to 11 January 2017. Ólöf was born in Reykjavík. She was married to Tómas Már Sigurðsson and had four children. Ólöf died from pancreatic cancer on 8 February 2017 in Reykjavík. She was 50. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Government ministers Category:Politicians from Reykjavík
title: Ólöf Nordal
